languages.text: {n}Дознаватель кланяется вам.{/n} "Благодарю за содействие, Лорд-капитан. Я организую и лично проведу изъятие ксеноса из вашего экипажа без жертв и разрушений".

traits.locale_text: {n}Дознаватель кланяется вам.{/n} "Благодарю за содействие, Лорд-капитан. Я организую и лично проведу изъятие ксеноса из вашего экипажа без жертв и разрушений".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}The Interrogator bows to you.{/n} "Thank you for facilitating this, Lord Captain. I will arrange and personally oversee the extraction of the xenos from your crew without any casualties or damage to your vessel."
languages.original_text: {n}Дознаватель кланяется вам.{/n} "Благодарю за содействие, Лорд-капитан. Я организую и лично проведу изъятие ксеноса из вашего экипажа без жертв и разрушений".

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}这位审讯官向你鞠了一躬。{/n}“感谢你的协助，舰长大人。我会亲自安排人手来抓捕那个异形。整件事情我会亲自负责，保证不会对你的船造成任何伤亡或损害。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator bows to you.{/n} "Thank you for facilitating this, Lord Captain. I will arrange and personally oversee the extraction of the xenos from your crew without any casualties or damage to your vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}这位审讯官向你鞠了一躬。{/n}“感谢你的协助，舰长大人。我会亲自安排人手来抓捕那个异形。整件事情我会亲自负责，保证不会对你的船造成任何伤亡或损害。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator bows to you.{/n} "Thank you for facilitating this, Lord Captain. I will arrange and personally oversee the extraction of the xenos from your crew without any casualties or damage to your vessel."

languages.text: {n}El interrogador te hace una reverencia.{/n} «Gracias por facilitarlo, Lord Capitán. Prepararé y supervisaré personalmente la extracción de la xenos de su tripulación sin bajas ni daños a la nave».
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator bows to you.{/n} "Thank you for facilitating this, Lord Captain. I will arrange and personally oversee the extraction of the xenos from your crew without any casualties or damage to your vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}El interrogador te hace una reverencia.{/n} «Gracias por facilitarlo, Lord Capitán. Prepararé y supervisaré personalmente la extracción de la xenos de su tripulación sin bajas ni daños a la nave».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}インテロゲイターはあなたに頭を下げる。{/n}「感謝する、ロード・キャプテン。私が、あなたの乗組員から異種族を引き離す差配と監督をいたしましょう。犠牲者もなく、船にも損害を出さぬように」
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator bows to you.{/n} "Thank you for facilitating this, Lord Captain. I will arrange and personally oversee the extraction of the xenos from your crew without any casualties or damage to your vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}インテロゲイターはあなたに頭を下げる。{/n}「感謝する、ロード・キャプテン。私が、あなたの乗組員から異種族を引き離す差配と監督をいたしましょう。犠牲者もなく、船にも損害を出さぬように」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Interrogator verneigt sich vor dir.{/n} "Danke, dass Ihr das möglich macht, Lord Captain. Ich werde persönlich die Extraktion der Xenos aus Eurer Crew arrangieren und beaufsichtigen, ohne Verletzte oder Schäden an Eurem Schiff."
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator bows to you.{/n} "Thank you for facilitating this, Lord Captain. I will arrange and personally oversee the extraction of the xenos from your crew without any casualties or damage to your vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Interrogator verneigt sich vor dir.{/n} "Danke, dass Ihr das möglich macht, Lord Captain. Ich werde persönlich die Extraktion der Xenos aus Eurer Crew arrangieren und beaufsichtigen, ohne Verletzte oder Schäden an Eurem Schiff."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}L'interrogateur s'incline.{/n} « Merci de me faciliter la tâche, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je veillerai personnellement à ce que la xénos soit extraite de votre équipage sans encombre. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator bows to you.{/n} "Thank you for facilitating this, Lord Captain. I will arrange and personally oversee the extraction of the xenos from your crew without any casualties or damage to your vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'interrogateur s'incline.{/n} « Merci de me faciliter la tâche, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je veillerai personnellement à ce que la xénos soit extraite de votre équipage sans encombre. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sorgucu, önünde eğiliyor.{/n} "Bu olanağı bahşettiğin için teşekkür ediyorum Lord Kaptan. Zenonun tayfada zayiat, gemide de hasar olmaksızın ihraç edilmesiyle bizzat meşgul olacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator bows to you.{/n} "Thank you for facilitating this, Lord Captain. I will arrange and personally oversee the extraction of the xenos from your crew without any casualties or damage to your vessel."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sorgucu, önünde eğiliyor.{/n} "Bu imkân için teşekkür ediyorum Lord Kapta. Zenonun tayfada zayiat veya gemide hasar olmaksızın ihraç edilmesiyle bizzat meşgul olacağım."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
